translations: n．恩人，捐助者：为他人或组织提供帮助、支持或捐款的人。
· The school was built with the help of several benefactors.
这所学校是在几位捐助者的帮助下建成的。

sentences.sentence: These benefactors have succeeded in their chosen fields, they say, and they want to use their wealth to draw attention to those who have succeeded in science.
sentences.translation: 他们说，这些捐助者已经在他们选择的领域里取得了成功，他们想用自己的财富来使那些在科学领域取得成功的人受到关注。

sentences.sentence: I watch "Game of Thrones." at 7 it's time to welcome home my benefactors.
sentences.translation: 下午6点的时候我看电视剧《冰与火之歌：权力的游戏》，7点就到了迎接我的资助者们回家的时候了。

sentences.sentence: The same is true of the more modern reformers and benefactors of their race.
sentences.translation: 那些跻身其中的近代改革家和慈善家，也是如此。
